item.title: Marinakis on trial in Athens over inciting gang violence
item.description: Nottingham Forest owner Evangelos Marinakis goes on trial in Athens accused of instigating football violence and supporting a criminal organisation.

item.title: 'It was fight or flight': Man drove car at train stabbings suspect after attack
item.description: Dave Scott says he used his car to hit the alleged attacker before police made an arrest.

item.title: Murder arrests after child killer found dead in cell
item.description: Kyle Bevan, 33, was found dead at HMP Wakefield in West Yorkshire on Wednesday, prompting a police inquiry.

item.title: Seven Italian climbers still missing in Nepal
item.description: Three other Italian climbers have been confirmed dead this week.

item.title: Wednesday's Beaver supermoon pictured around the world
item.description: Photographers have been out and about capturing the Beaver Moon as it rose on Wednesday.
